channel.title: NPC Help!

item.title: NPC Help!
item.dc:creator: @Patrickftw Patrickftw
item.description:
@Patrickftw wrote:

I tried around 3 different ways to make it add an item after you kill an NPCâ€¦Is this possible? Would this work:

if(npcs[#].npcType == #) { int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling; client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player]; ppl.sendMessage("blah"); addItem(#,#) }

Read full topic
